mapper.insert: insert into board_type(bt_type, bt_name, bt_r_authority, bt_w_authority) values(#{bt.bt_type},#{bt.bt_name},#{bt.bt_r_authority},#{bt.bt_w_authority})
mapper.update: update board_type set bt_type = #{bt.bt_type}, bt_name = #{bt.bt_name}, bt_r_authority = #{bt.bt_r_authority}, bt_w_authority = #{bt.bt_w_authority} where bt_num = #{bt.bt_num}
mapper.insert: insert into board(bo_num,bo_title, bo_content, bo_me_id, bo_bt_num, bo_ori_num ) select ifnull(max(bo_num),0)+1, #{bo.bo_title},#{bo.bo_content}, #{bo.bo_me_id}, #{bo.bo_bt_num}, ifnull(max(bo_num),0)+1 from board
mapper.select: select * from board join board_type on bo_bt_num = bt_num order by bo_num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
mapper.update: update board set bo_views = bo_views+1 where bo_num = #{bo_num}
mapper.select: select * from likes where li_bo_num = #{li_bo_num} and li_me_id = #{li_me_id}
mapper.update: update board set bo_title = #{bo.bo_title}, bo_content = #{bo.bo_content}, bo_bt_num = #{bo.bo_bt_num}, bo_update_date = now() where bo_num = #{bo.bo_num}

update board set bo_up = (select count(*) from likes where li_bo_num = #{bo_num} and li_state = 1), bo_down = (select count(*) from likes where li_bo_num = #{bo_num} and li_state = -1) where bo_num = #{bo_num}
